root.name: Celebrity Sports Showdown
root.description: CelebritiesTen celebrities have been confirmed to be in this game. They are:Fergie Avril Lavigne LeAnn Rimes Keith Urban Nelly Furtardo Paul Peirce Mia Hamm Kristi Yamaguchi Reggie Bush Sugar Ray Leonard Sports There are twelve sports in this game. They are:Beach Volleyball Inner-Tubing Wild water canoeing Hurdle Derby Slalom Showdown Cliff Hangers Smash Badminton Rapid Fire Archery Joust Duel Curling Arena Dodgeball Air Racers
